description: Seeking Top Talent in Glendale, CA: Our Clients Need Qualified Candidates! Respond promptly and accurately to new screening requests and stakeholder inquiries. Process virtual screener requests independently, ensuring compliance with audience confidentiality requirements through documented signatures. Evaluate current processes and identify opportunities for efficiency improvements. Assist in onboarding third-party supply chain vendor personnel for high-security projects, managing communications, online training, and application license setup. Generate monthly reports summarizing support activities and providing insights into security impacts on key titles.
responsibilities: Respond to screening requests and stakeholder inquiries promptly and accurately.
